title: Ticket #1152: Simplify testing: "./configure && make && make test"
description:
Building and testing Condor is an 8 step process, of which only a handle are common. 

./build_init
./configure
make release
make testbin
cd condor_tests
make all
PATH=`pwd`/../release_dir/bin:`pwd`/../release_dir/sbin:$PATH
./batch_test.pl -b -c

The desired goal is for building and testing to be 

./configure && make && make test

Checking in the configure script is out of the scope of this ticket (see #1151), but we can handle the later steps.
remarks:
2010-Jan-28 16:03:15 by adesmet:
Implemented. As batch_test.pl gets simplified we'll probably need to tweak it.
check_ins: 2010-Jan-28 15:54   Check-in [17006]: You can now "make && make test" or "cd condor_tests; make test" Test specific prerequisites ("make testbin; cd condor_tests; make all") are built first, then batch_test.pl with some plausibly reasonable defaults is run. #1152 (By Alan De Smet )
